text:
Content / form / whatever HubDB fields when?

Now you either instruct the client or whoever to get a form id from the form editor or page id or use a URL field and that's too difficult for people, and writing your own interface for the user to manage hubdb data is 99,9999% of the time too much work (money) to be feasible.

Also is there a reason why boolean hubdb fields (0/1) are Long. Asking for a friend

Thanks, John! I’m the PM for Blog and I updated the community forum to “In Planning” two days ago before I saw this message. It is definitely on our radar and one of our priorities this year. Hopefully, we can deliver it before the end of the year. If either of you wants to share any specific feedback/suggestions or would like to talk through it you are welcome to schedule a <http://meetings.HubSpot.com/yaisah|quick chat> with me.
Thank you for keeping us updated <@U02PV07NQSX>!
a form column type would be amazing
